sentences.en: ...a convocation of the American Youth Congress.
At our convocation ceremony we all threw our caps in the air.
sentences.cn: 在我们的毕业典礼上,我们都把学士帽抛到空中.

sentences.en: On the seventh day you shall have a holy convocation; you shall do no laborious work.
sentences.cn: 民 28:25 第七日当有圣会、甚麽劳碌的工都不可作.

sentences.en: The award ceremony will be part of the Convocation Proceedings.
sentences.cn: 颁奖典礼将会是毕业典礼的一部分.

sentences.en: The convocation about environment will be held on next Monday.
sentences.cn: 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行.

sentences.en: The convocation ceremony officially begins the semester.
sentences.cn: 随着这次开学典礼的召开,此学期正式开始了.

sentences.en: The semester begins with a convocation ceremony.
sentences.cn: 新学期随着开学典礼的举行而开始了.

sentences.en: They regretted agreeing to the convocation of that meeting.
sentences.cn: 他们后悔同意召开这个会议.

sentences.en: We declared ourselves for the immediate convocation of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们主张立即召开这个会议.

words.tran_cn: 召集；集会；教士会议；评议会

trans.tran_en: a large formal meeting of a group of people, especially church officials
